data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Betancur-R, Ricardo, P, Arturo Acero (2004): tus (Jordan and Gilbert) (Siluriformes: Ariidae) from the eastern Pacific, with evidence of monophyly and limits of Notarius. Zootaxa 703: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158781
